articles.author: Kate O'Flaherty
articles.title: iOS 17.4.1—Update Now Warning Issued To All iPhone Users - Forbes
articles.description: Apple has issued iOS 17.4.1, along with a warning to update now. Here's everything you need to know about Apple's latest iPhone update.
articles.content:
Apple has issued iOS 17.4.1, along with a warning to update now. Thats because the iOS 17.4.1 update includes important security fixes that should be applied by all iPhone users.
